entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
